Talks

I spent a fair amount of time speaking at conferences. This page shows some of my talks, some with videos. It’s not complete and never will be, but I try to add the interesting ones here

  • Evolving an ecosystem. Lessons learned building tools for Scala (Scala Sphere 2016, Krakow)
  • Leverage Mesos for Running Spark Streaming Production Jobs (Spark Summit 2015, Amsterdam)
  • A dance with tools (Scala World 2015, Penrith)
  • Rethinking the debugger (ScalaDays 2014, Berlin)
    • better described in my paper Stack Retention in Concurrent Programs, in Scala Workshop ‘13, Montpellier, 2013 (tool demo)
  • Scala Abide! A Lint tool for Scala (Scala eXchange, London 2014)
  • Scala IDE from 0 to 4.0 (ScalaDays 2015, San Francisco)
  • Scala and Apache Spark (VoxxedDays 2015, Ticino)
  • Scala - Performance improvements of a factor of 4 to 30, Boxing and Specialization (London 2010, Skills Matter)
